Home.title: Discover Culinary Mastery!
Home.text: Inspired recipes and ready-made meals – for those who value taste, convenience, and harmony in their favorite dishes.

Steps.subtitle: Take a few simple steps, from viewing the menu to ordering directly to your table.
Steps.step1Description: Specify what you have at home—and get a selection of recipes.
Steps.step2Description: Go to the "Menu" section via the main site menu or the button on the banner.
Steps.step3Description: Cook independently following the recipe or order the meal ready-made.

MenuSection.title: Don't know what to choose? Start with the hit categories
MenuSection.subtitle: A quick selection of what people love most. Sometimes the choice is too vast, and it's hard to settle on one thing. That's why we've prepared hit categories—dishes that enjoy the greatest popularity. These are tested flavors chosen again and again. If you're in doubt, start with them.

SelectedDishesSection.title: Master's main tip: enjoy!
SelectedDishesSection.subtitle: A quick selection of what people love most. Sometimes the choice is too vast, and it's hard to settle on one thing. That's why we've prepared hit categories—dishes that enjoy the greatest popularity. These are tested flavors chosen again and again. If you're in doubt, start with them.

PartnersSection.title: Where the most delicious food is cooked
PartnersSection.subtitle: We have selected establishments for you where every dish is prepared with soul, attention to detail, and a love for taste. Here it's not just food—these are small gastronomic discoveries that you can enjoy right at home. Order your favorite and experience the restaurant atmosphere without queues or unnecessary fuss.

Menu.title: Welcome to our application!
Menu.text: This is the home page where you can find the latest updates and features.
